name: Find New Products
description: Research and identify new products to add to Dress Like Mommy
trigger: find new products, search for products, what should we sell

steps.label: Identify trend or season
steps.description: What's coming up? Valentine's, Easter, Summer, Back to School, etc.

steps.label: Research trending styles
steps.description: Check Pinterest, Instagram, TikTok for mommy-and-me trends

steps.label: Analyze competitor bestsellers
steps.description: Check PatPat, Popreal, Amazon for what's selling

steps.label: Search suppliers (1688/AliExpress)
steps.description: Find products with good margins (<$10 cost, $25+ sell)

steps.label: CHECK FOR DUPLICATES
steps.description: Check against ALL existing products - DRAFTS and LISTED. If it exists in any status, skip it.

steps.label: Calculate margins
steps.description: Cost + shipping + fees vs selling price (min 50% margin)

steps.label: Check BuckyDrop availability
steps.description: Verify product can be pushed through BuckyDrop

steps.label: Present top picks to Francisco
steps.description: Show options with photos, prices, margins for approval
